title: Pigeon infestation is out of control
content: Was peacefully drinking coffee on the 4th floor (ECC) and this flying rat of a fuckass pigeon decides to take a massive dump on my shirt. How is this place so poorly maintained despite being the main cafeteria for the building.

comments.body: Worst part, your literally like in a cage while sitting in 4th floor cafeteria ðŸ˜­
Pls away from pigeon , they can serious  health issues, also impect the lungs health

they dont even keep the campus fucking clean. If you look outside the boys washrom on the first floor, you can see like a billion dead pigeons just rotting there, so much fucking trash thrown there. I dont understand how hard it is to throw waste in a dustbin, the whole of ec campus has rubbish everywhere and is such an eyesore. These are the type of people that wanna live abroad, useless fuckers, dont even have the basic civic sense to walk up to a dustbin and throw the trash there. Fuck EC Campus, genuinely hate it so fucking much
